titles: An ansvver to the author of Humble thanks for His Majesties gracious declaration for liberty of conscience.
author: Y. Z.
publisher: Printed for J. Edwin at the three Roses in Ludgate-street,
notes: Verse: "'Twixt heaven and thee, how sprung these fatal jars ..."
A reply to the work by Robert Wild, with reference to Charles II's declaration of 15 March 1672.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
